title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: Evenfrom Crosslee on the Ettrick, and Shielshaughlower down the vale; from Redfordgreen, andthe wilds beyond it ; from the head of St Mary'sLoch ; from Elibank and Ashiestiel on the Tweed,
